Parts.A:
Well then, Exile. You made your choice. Off you go!

  ((You received member role and your welcome kit. Go through the door behind you.))

Oh well hello there, Exile. It would seem you have found yourself at an impasse? Stolen away somewhere between the Exiled Lands and certain death, only saved by dear Kismet. Surely, you must be grateful for this, as surely you must know that he may not just release you back into your new home. It is, quite simply, too dangerous.
Parts.B: I can face these dangers!;It is dangerous indeed...

Parts.A:
You think you can face these dangers? Humor has not left you, it seems. But very well, I shall give you the choice. Reconsider, and pay the debt you are owed to me - or face dire consequences.

  What will you decide?
Parts.B: I will face dire consequences!;I will repay my debt!

Parts.A:
So it shall be. You may leave through the portal behind you. Because of the dealings with the being that saved you, I have to provide you with some survival basics. But that is all.

  What happens to you - I can make no promises.

I am glad you see reason, dear Exile. After all, you and your fellow prisoners were part in my eventual success. Quite naturally, the decision on this matter was never yours. Dear Kismet has already entrusted me with your saftey, and as such, you are indebted to me. And you will need to repay this debt once you step foot into your new home. Should you decide to not repay your debt to me in time - dire consequences surely will follow.

  Now that I have explained your situation - it is time for your first task. Step through the portal behind you, and you will find yourself in Muriela's Deceit. A really fitting name. There, near the prison, you will find a woman of many talents. Her name is Lucy, and she has work that requires doing.

  To make things easier for you, I will provide you with some basic equipment.

  Now then. Off you go, Exile!

<Once you put your hand on the handle of the door you feel a tingling sensation. Are you really ready to face these dangers, or do you perhaps require some more strength?>

  ((Chose "More Strength" to gain your level 60 boost, Chose "I am strong enough!" to not get your level 60 boost. If you are a new player, not taking the level 60 boost is recommended to get the full experience))
